attributes.action: Learners drivers must pass a Highway Code  test before being granted a provisional licence.
attributes.additional_details:
Driving without a basic knowledge of the rules of the road and road signs is potentially very dangerous.

I PROPOSE THAT ANYONE WANTING TO LEARN TO DRIVE MUST MUST PASS A WRITTEN  TEST, BASED ON THE HIGHWAY CODE, BEFORE THEY ARE ALLOWED TO  APPLY FOR  THEIR PROVISIONAL LICENCE.
